channel.title: I still need help! any way to make varrok a safezone in testscape?
channel.description:
PLEASE HELP ME, I HAVE TOS-SCAPE, AND ITS LOTS EDITED, BUT THE OWNER(MOD JENZ) MADE VARROK NOT SAFE, SO ITS LIKE YOU CAN PK. IS THERE [glow=yellow,2,300][size=20pt][i][b]ANY WAY AT ALL[/b][/i][/size][/glow] TO MAKE VARROK SAFE AGAIN? I GOT SHOPS THERE AND I DONT WANT PEOPLE TO DIE!!! PLEASE HELP ME YOU WILL GET ADMIN OR MOD IN MY UPCOMING SERVER! PLEASE HELP ME! contact me here, msn or aim msn kousinzack92@earthlink.net aim kousinzackk1992 PLEASE HELP, THANKS!
OTHER PROBLEMS ARE THAT WHEN YOU DOUBLE CLICK ONE FOOD, YOUR WEAPON DISSAPPEARS, AND WHEN YOU DIE, YOU DONT LOSE ANY ITEMS.. ANY HELP WITH ANY OF THESE IS GREATLY APPRECIATED! PLEASE!

item.title: I still need help! any way to make varrok a safezone in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
Ok the coords i want are (absX >= 3191 && absX <= 3405 && absY >= 3495 && absY <=3405 But all the other numbers i see idk wat they mean theres all like different ones!, can some1 plug them in for me so i can just copy and paste please…

Read full topic

item.title: I still need help! any way to make varrok a safezone in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]cant some1 do it lolz plz…

Yes, that somebody is you.
Nobody here is going to develop your server for you, all we can do is point you in the right direction. Find out the coords by walking to the edges of what you want your safezone to be and getting your coords (I believe the command is “::mypos” or something similar) and then plug them in.[/quote]
oh, so this: if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||
heightLevel == 1)
So i chane the 3249 and 3258 to the first set of coords, and the 3438 and 3431 to the next set of coords?

Read full topic

@PaulT wrote:

cant some1 do it lolz plz...

Yes, that somebody is you.
Nobody here is going to develop your server for you, all we can do is point you in the right direction. Find out the coords by walking to the edges of what you want your safezone to be and getting your coords (I believe the command is “::mypos” or something similar) and then plug them in.

item.title: I still need help! any way to make varrok a safezone in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

yes…look at…

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 )|| 
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

make it look like:

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || 
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

now where it says:

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || heightLevel == 1)
imagine varock as a giant square…they first set of x and y co-ords are the bottom left corner of varrock…the second set of x and y co-ords are the top right corner of varrock…so all you have to do is find those co-ords and add hem in

Read full topic

item.title: I still need help! any way to make varrok a safezone in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:6, topic:41403”]Hi Zach,

Posting in all capital letters is not necessary, people will actually be more likely to respond if you post in a less sensational manner.

To change the size of the safezone, edit the coordinates in the code that was posted.[/quote]
Is there any way that somebody can do the coords for me, they can become admin if it works, because im not sure of the borders or coords of whole varrok. please, and thank you

Read full topic

Posting in all capital letters is not necessary, people will actually be more likely to respond if you post in a less sensational manner.

To change the size of the safezone, edit the coordinates in the code that was posted.
